LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.label: beautiful
LanguageData.VME_Junk_Beautiful.description:
The machinations of old are breath-taking, and their weathering should be viewed as art. It's wonderful to live surrounded by things discarded by others.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Ancient junk buildings can be uninstalled and placed again as needed.
 - Colonists gets mood penalties / bonuses depending on amount of ancient junk buildings in a 20 tiles radius around them. Effect checks approximately once every 5 hours.
